name: InetAddressValidator_isValidInet6AddressTest
description: Unit tests for validating IPv6 addresses using InetAddressValidator.

test_cases.name: testValidInet6Address
test_cases.description: Tests the validation of valid IPv6 addresses.

test_cases.name: testInvalidInet6Address
test_cases.description: Tests the validation of invalid IPv6 addresses.

test_cases.name: testValidInet6AddressWithIPv4
test_cases.description: Tests the validation of valid IPv6 addresses containing embedded IPv4 addresses.

test_cases.name: testInvalidInet6AddressWithIPv4
test_cases.description: Tests the validation of invalid IPv6 addresses containing invalid embedded IPv4 addresses.

test_cases.name: testInvalidInet6AddressWithMultiplePrefixes
test_cases.description: Tests the validation of invalid IPv6 addresses with multiple prefixes.

test_cases.name: testInvalidInet6AddressWithInvalidZoneId
test_cases.description: Tests the validation of invalid IPv6 addresses with invalid zone identifiers.
